General.Name: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the engages in the wholesale of computers and telecommunication products in Turkey. The company also involved in the wholesale trading of office and consumer products, corporate products, printers, software, consumer electronics, and mobile phones and other mobile devices, as well as personal computers, by-products, and peripherals; online electronics retailing and marketplace management businesses; and sale of sensors, security camera, and internet of things products. In addition, it offers various solutions, such as automation and Internet of Things, server infrastructure, data center, Arena energy, cloud technology, and security solutions. Further, the company provides Bulutum.com, an end-to-end cloud services platform with pre-sales and post-sales technical support, training, and payment facilities that helps business partners to create business opportunities; Pencere.com, a communication and interaction portal; and Paynet that provides payment, collection, and financial solutions to B2B, B2B2C, and B2C companies in various sectors, such as construction materials, marine materials, paint, health equipment, musical instruments, machinery, spare automotive parts, and others. Additionally, it offers Arena Galaxy, a portal to test the technology and system requirements; GoPlus, a phone, tablet, smart watch, and computer purchase service; financial services comprising financial solutions to B2B, B2B2C, and B2C companies in various sectors, such as construction materials, marine materials, paints, health equipment, musical instruments, machinery, spare automotive parts, and others; and Arena Connect that offers smart communication devices purchasing and distribution services, as well as payment brokerage, technical, and logistics services. Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

3.Name: Mr. Kerem  Gunay
3.Title: Exec. VP of Product Management and Marketing
